thread.title: Greek stock market to remain closed until Thursday
thread.title_full: Greek stock market to remain closed until Thursday - MarketWatch

author: By     Karen Friar
title: Greek stock market to remain closed until Thursday
text: The Athens stock market will remain closed Tuesday and Wednesday, after a decision to extend the holiday for banks, the Hellenic Capital Market Commission said in a statement . Trading on the Athex GD, +2.03% was halted on Monday last week after a breakdown in bailout negotiations between the Greek government and its international lenders. Banks will also stay shuttered until Thursday, after a similar closure, as Greece looks to restart reform talks with its creditors.
